content: hobbii pattern nr 1006-202-2552 have you seen anything as pretty as this sparkling rainbow sweater a simple crocheted sweater elevated to something else by a little glitter and color it s crocheted in the wonderful universe yarn that is available in the most beautiful colorways the sweater can be crocheted in 8 sizes from s to 5xl pick your favorite universe and get started * this jumper has an oversized fit with a positive ease of about 14 cm around bust circumference * the construction of the jumper is from 2 identical panels sewed together * the crochet direction is horizontal number of stitches in a row gives the jumper s length and the number of row gives the width * for a longer jumper start with more stitches as foundation to adjust the width just work more or less row on the main rectangle * the sleeves are worked by continuing the main rectangle you can adjust the width of the sleeve by starting with less stitches the length of the sleeve can be adjusted by working more or less row **sizes ** xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl **skill level ** intermediate **crochet hook ** 4 00 mm us size g **materials ** stitch markers sewing needle for weaving in the ends scissors **gauge ** 19 double_crochet = 10 cm 10 row = 10 cm **yarn ** universe in color supercluster #05 **how much yarn do you need ** xs 3 skeins s m 4 skeins l 5 skeins xl 6 skeins 2xl 3xl 7 skeins 4xl 8 skeins
